ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Skeleton Man discovers that it was Crypt Chick that shot his wife and was the cause of Tarot and Raven Hex's mother's Death! Jon is compelled to tell the sisters, and Crypt Chick wants them all dead - including Jon!
